name: British Council
membership: EUNIC, Practitioners Network, More Europe-Culture and External action, Cultural Diplomacy Platform, the Big 4 (Expertise France, DAAD, Neuffic, British Council)
goal:
The British Council creates international opportunities for the people of the UK and other countries, and builds trust between them worldwide.

The British Council works in over 100 countries, connecting millions of people with the United Kingdom through programmes and services in the English language, the Arts, Education and Society (Gender, justice, civil society and social enterprise).
interests: Borders and Security, Business and Industry, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, European Neighbourhood Policy, External Relations, Foreign affairs and security policy, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Sport, Youth
euInitiatives: social enterprise, gender equality, creative economy, cultre and development, cultural diplomacy, youth employment, access to justice, security and youth resilience, sport, schools and higher education
